snippet: Katie Holmes (once Mrs. Tom Cruise, if you hadn’t heard) and Norbert Leo Butz are among the Midwesterners in “Dead Accounts,” a play set in Cincinnati and opening this month on Broadway.
abstract: Actress Katie Holmes still thinks of herself as Midwestern and sees parallels between her life and that of the character she plays in the upcoming Broadway play Dead Accounts.
lead_paragraph: Katie Holmes (once Mrs. Tom Cruise, if you hadn’t heard) and Norbert Leo Butz are among the Midwesterners in “Dead Accounts,” a play set in Cincinnati and opening this month on Broadway.

headline.seo: Katie Holmes and Norbert Leo Butz in ‘Dead Accounts’
headline.main: Broadway’s Just a Suburb of Cincinnati
headline.print_headline: Broadway’s Just a Suburb Of Cincinnati
